property.name: MessageCount
property.formula: (SELECT count(an.Id) FROM ArticleNewsgroup an WHERE an.NewsGroupId = Id AND an.Cancelled = 0 AND an.Pending = 0)

property.name: LowWatermark
property.formula: (SELECT min(an.Number) FROM ArticleNewsgroup an WHERE an.NewsGroupId = Id AND an.Cancelled = 0 AND an.Pending = 0)

property.name: HighWatermark
property.formula: (SELECT max(an.Number) FROM ArticleNewsgroup an WHERE an.NewsGroupId = Id AND an.Cancelled = 0 AND an.Pending = 0)
